price: (Abo babangikanyamana) ntibubahiriza isano cyangwa isezerano bafitanye n’umwemera! Kandi abo ni bo barengera (imbago za Allah).
arabic: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِي مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illan walā dhimmatan wa-ulāika humu al-muʿ'tadūna
